thread.title: ASML on Track for Record Sales as Profit Jumps
thread.title_full: ASML on Track for Record Sales as Profit Jumps

author: morningstar.com
title: ASML on Track for Record Sales as Profit Jumps
text:
By Maarten van Tartwijk
AMSTERDAM--Dutch semiconductor-equipment maker ASML Holding NV (ASML) on Wednesday reported a jump in third-quarter net profit and said it remains on track to achieve record sales this year.
Net profit was 322 million euros ($366 million) compared with EUR244 million in the same period a year earlier, and EUR370 million in the previous quarter. Revenue was EUR1.55 billion in the quarter, compared with EUR1.65 billion in the prior period.
The results were broadly in line with company guidance and analysts' estimates.
ASML, whose customers include large chip makers such as Intel Corp. (INTC) and Samsung Electronics Co. (005930.SE), said it expects fourth-quarter sales to fall to around EUR1.4 billion, in part because its foundry customers have become slightly more cautious in their investment plans. The company, however, said it remains on track to achieve record sales in 2015.
-Write to Maarten van Tartwijk at maartenvan.tartwijk@wsj.com
 14, 2015 01:38 ET (05:38
